## Slide 1

```{r}
 #| echo: true
 #| code-line-numbers: '16-35'
library(tidyverse)
library(patchwork)

data(mpg)

class_dat <- mpg |>
  group_by(class) |>
  summarise(
    n = n(),
    mean_hwy = mean(hwy),
    label = str_c("n = ", n, sep = "")
  )

ggplot(data = mpg, aes(class, hwy)) +
  geom_point(position = position_jitter(width = 0.1)) +
  geom_point(
    data = class_dat,
    mapping = aes(y = mean_hwy),
    size = 5,
    alpha = 0.6,
    color = "red") +
  labs(
    x = "Vehicle class",
    y = "Highway miles per gallon"
  ) +
  theme_minimal() +
  geom_text(
    data = class_dat,
    aes(x = class, y = 10, label = label)
  ) +
  scale_y_continuous(
    limits = c(10, 45)
  )
```
